name: Dragonbound Warrior

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dragonbound warriors serve a dragon by choice or compulsion
actions.desc: A dragonbound warrior typically guards their masters lair or patrols the surrounding area. Most dragonbound warriors are dragonborn or kobolds  but anyone can fall sway to a dragons majesty.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The warrior is resistant to one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.

special_abilities.name: Draconic Smite
special_abilities.desc: The warriors weapon attacks deal an additional (1d6) damage of one damage type dealt by their draconic masters breath weapon.
